abstract: Such caravans have angered President Trump, who has tried to compel his regional counterparts to step up their enforcement efforts.
lead_paragraph: MEXICO CITY â€” Hundreds of Hondurans, many with hopes of reaching the United States, streamed toward the Guatemalan border on Wednesday in the kind of migrant caravan that, in 2018 and 2019, angered President Trump and posed a direct challenge to governments throughout the region.
